String.name: Speed Boost
String.tooltip: Increases your non-combat movement speed by $value.

String.name: Merciless Leap
String.tooltip: Your Leaping Strike deals 5x damage against knocked-down enemies.

String.name: Staggering Riposte
String.tooltip: When you are hit, you can counter with Staggering Counter.

String.name: Delete_Shield Counter I
String.tooltip: Gain a chance to counterattack while using Stand Fast. You cannot be knocked down or stunned, and you take only half damage while using this skill.

String.tooltip: Gain a chance to counterattack while using Stand Fast. You cannot be knocked down or stunned, and you take only half damage while using this skill.

String.name: Hold the Line
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODRestores Resolve and draws more aggro.$COLOR_END$BRSuccessful Stand Fast recovers 50 Resolve and gains 1% additional aggro. Additional aggro can stack up to 20 times, but will disappear on being successfully hit.

String.name: Leash: Master's Leash
String.tooltip: You can follow up with the Master's Leash skill after you use Leash.

String.name: Merciless Leap
String.tooltip: Your Leaping Strike deals 5x damage against knocked-down enemies.

String.name: Icy Veins
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODUsing In Cold Blood resets cooldowns.$COLOR_END$BRIn Cold Blood resets the cooldowns for Heart Thrust, Knockdown Strike, and Whirlwind.

String.name: Knockdown Strike Boost I
String.tooltip: Increases damage to multiple targets with Knockdown Strike.

String.name: Whirlwind Intensity
String.tooltip: Increases damage to multiple targets with Whirlwind.

String.name: Merciless Leap
String.tooltip: Your Leaping Strike deals 5x damage against knocked-down enemies.

String.name: Amok
String.tooltip: [Temporary] Berserker_Ultimate Blow I

String.name: Opportunity Knocks
String.tooltip: Do additional damage to any monster that is currently focused on another player.

String.name: Cyclone Intensity
String.tooltip: Increases damage to multiple targets with Cyclone.

String.name: Fireblast Intensity
String.tooltip: Increases damage to multiple targets with Fireblast.

String.name: Flame Pillar Intensity
String.tooltip: Increases damage to multiple targets with Flame Pillar.

String.name: Opportunity Knocks
String.tooltip: Do additional damage to any monster that is currently focused on another player.

String.name: Indomitable Spirit
String.tooltip: When your HP is below 30%, you take $value% less damage from other players.

String.name: Resilience of Body
String.tooltip: Heals you continuously after you're resurrected.

String.name: Nomadic Crafter
String.tooltip: Increases crafting speed for light armor by $value.

String.name: Resilience of Mind
String.tooltip: Restores your MP continuously after you're resurrected.

String.name: Coalescence
String.tooltip: Increases gathering speed for essence.

String.name: Dirty Fighting
String.tooltip: Increases crit rate by 1% when you attack the target from behind.

String.name: Weaponforger
String.tooltip: Increases crafting speed for metallic weapons by $value.

String.name: Light Landing
String.tooltip: Decreases falling damage by $value.

String.name: No Stranger to Pain
String.tooltip: Decreases PvE and PvP damage taken by $value when your HP is below 30%.

String.name: Blood of Dragons
String.tooltip: Increases resistance to periodic damage by $value.

String.name: Prospector
String.tooltip: Increases ore gathering speed.

String.name: Botanist
String.tooltip: Increases plant gathering speed.

String.name: Friendly Current
String.tooltip: Your swimming speed is faster than other races.

String.name: Indefatigable
String.tooltip: Your Stamina does not fall below 20%.

String.name: Gather No Moss
String.tooltip: Increases resistance to stun by $value.

String.name: Time-Lost Techniques
String.tooltip: Increases crafting speed for magic weapons by $value.

String.name: Veil of Shadows
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODRevival.$COLOR_END$BRYou do not die when you take lethal damage. Instead, you are knocked down, and enter the veil of shadows, where you immediately regain 15% of your HP. While in the veil, all damage is reduced by 50% but you cannot recover HP normally. You recover up to 30% of max HP when the effect ends. Veil of Shadows will only activate once every 10 minutes.

String.name: Vampiric Whipsaw
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODRecovers HP with each hit.$COLOR_END$BRRecover 1.5% of your total HP every time you hit a target with Whipsaw.

String.name: Brutal Smite
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases Smite damage against knocked-down targets.$COLOR_END$BRDoubles the damage dealt with Smite when attacking knocked-down targets.

String.name: Warfreak
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases Movement Speed after killing an enemy$COLOR_END$BRIncreases Movement Speed by 50% for 5 seconds after dealing a fatal blow. After reaching level 10, also adds 100 Willpower.

String.name: Unified Theory Expert
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODFocused Willpower$COLOR_END$BRAfter level 10, a gunner gains Willpower by defeating enemies, which can then be used to power the skills Burst Fire, Bombardment, and Balder's Vengeance. Willpower can be stored for up to 60 seconds, after which it decays rapidly. Defeating an enemy restarts this countdown..

String.name: Battlefield Awareness
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODScattershot Cooldown Reset$COLOR_END$BRScattershot is immediately available after using Rolling Reload.

String.name: Reload_Shotgun
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODCooldown Reset$COLOR_END$BRReset the cooldown for Scattershot

String.name: Reload_Timebomb Shot
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODCooldown Reset$COLOR_END$BRReset the cooldown for Time Bomb

String.name: Reload_Arcane Impact Shot
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODCooldown Reset$COLOR_END$BRReset the cooldown for Arcane Barrage

String.name: Reload_Aimed Fire
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODCooldown Reset$COLOR_END$BRRest the cooldown for [Aimed Fire]

String.name: Activate Emergency Barrier I
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODDamage Reduction$COLOR_END$BRPartially shields a gunner from a fatal enemy attack. Consumes 1000 MP, lasts 6 seconds, and can be activated only once every 10 minutes.

String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODDamage Reduction$COLOR_END$BRPartially shields a gunner from a fatal enemy attack. Consumes 1000 MP, lasts 6 seconds, and can be activated only once every 10 minutes.

String.name: Reload_Electric Shot
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODCooldown Reset$COLOR_END$BRResets cooldown for Electric Bomb

String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases skill damage of Burst Fire$COLOR_END$BRBurst Fire does more damage to minions.

String.name: Collective Nature
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODGain additional gold.$COLOR_END$BRGain 1% more gold off the ground.

String.name: Union Mission
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODGain additional credits.$COLOR_END$BRGain 5% more reputation credits from dailies.

String.name: Hard Core
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases stun resistance.$COLOR_END$BRIncreases stun resistance by 5%.

String.name: Tenacious Aura
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODImmunity to stun and knockdown.$COLOR_END$BRImmunity to stun and knockdown effects for allies near the assault commander. (Only activates in alliance territory.)

String.name: Enduring Aura
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases defense.$COLOR_END$BRSignificantly increases Endurance and defense for allies near the defense commander. (Only activates in alliance territory.)

String.name: Wholehearted Aura
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODIncreases Stamina.$COLOR_END$BRContinuously increases Stamina for allies near the adjunct commander. (Only activates in alliance territory.)
